steps.name: user is on index page url as "https://automationteststore.com/" and page title as "A place to practice your automation skills!"

arguments.val: "A place to practice your automation skills!"

steps.name: user clicks on Login Or Register link
user should be on account login page with option to login as "Returning Customer" or create an Account as "I am a new customer."
user verifies register account radio button is checked and clicks on Continue button
user is on account create page and verifies page heading as "CREATE ACCOUNT" and page Url contains "?rt=account/create"
user is in personal details in "Your Personal Details"
user enters First Name box as FirstName
user enters Last Name box as LastName
user enters fresh email in E-Mail box
user enters Telephone box as 07400000000
user enters Fax box as 07400000001
user on Address Section as "Your Address"
user enters Company name as YourCompanyName
user enters Address One box as yourAddress1
user enters Address Two box as yourAddress2
user enters City box as yourCity
user enters Region or State box as "Lancashire"
user enters ZIP Code box as "M11 IPT"
user enters Country box as "United Kingdom"
user on login section as "Login Details"
user enters loginName in Login name box
user enters password in Password box as "Password@123"
user enters Confirm password in Password Confirm box as "Password@123"
user subscribed to Newsletter and check on Yes
user ticks on read and agree to the Privacy Policy radio button
user clicks on Continue button
user gets success confirmation message as "YOUR ACCOUNT HAS BEEN CREATED!"
user gets congratulatory message as "Congratulations! Your new account has been successfully created!"

arguments.val: "Congratulations! Your new account has been successfully created!"

steps.name: user clicks on ContinueAccountSuccess button
user is on home page and presented with welcome message as "Welcome back yourFirstName"
user clicks on logoff button on Account page
user on account logout page url contains "?rt=account/logout" and clicks on logout Continue Button
user is on index page url as "https://automationteststore.com/" and page title as "A place to practice your automation skills!"

arguments.val: "A place to practice your automation skills!"

elements.name: user should be able to place an order

steps.name: user is on index page url as "https://automationteststore.com/" and page title as "A place to practice your automation skills!"

arguments.val: "A place to practice your automation skills!"

steps.name: user clicks on search box and enters product name as "Lipstick" and click on search button
user should be able to see search result item and click on add to cart button
user enters a number in quantity box to increases items by "4" and clicks on remove icon to remove from cart
user starts all over again from the previous steps as "Lipstick" and increases items by "6"
user verifies the product item by item image, unit price, quantity and grand total
user clicks on the Checkout button
user should be on account login page with option to login as "Returning Customer" or create an Account as "I am a new customer."
user enters login Name as "datastudioplace" and password as "Manchester1" and clicks on Login button
user on checkout confirmation page and validates all the order details displayed
user clicks on confirm order button
user presented with a checkout success page as "Your order #3030 has been created!"
user gets an order number as "Your order #3030 has been created!" and thank message displayed as "Thank you for shopping with us!"
user clicks on continue and logout button
user is back to home page

name: Verifying e-commerce Search to Order item functionality
